text.div:
Reimbursement Action Code

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
0 OCE line item denial or rejection is not ignoredadded v2.4
1 OCE line item denial or rejection is ignoredadded v2.4
2 External line item denial. Line item is denied even if no OCE editsadded v2.4
3 External line item rejection. Line item is rejected even if no OCE editsadded v2.4

name: v2.0459
title: v2 Reimbursement Action Code
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0459 ( Reimbursement Action Code)
